title: Snow Globe

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player not covered in frost. Roleblock all their visitors.
- **Super Snowy Sphere** - Roleblock a player. Super Freeze them and all of their non-Everfrost visitors. A player who has been Super Frozen requires 3 non-Everfrost players to visit them to be able to survive. Roleblock immune roles can be Super Frozen. This is not usable until Night 3.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock Immune.

> While this is alive, players covered in frost are not able to help defrost other players.

desc:
Post 650
*"It's snowing!"*
*"It's the middle of summer there isn't snow outsi-"*
*These 2 people were then froze to death, in the middle of summer.*
